## Job Related to Data Science

In my opinion, current **aerospace engineering jobs** are related to *data science* without a doubt. In other words, the world-leading aerospace industry is utilizing *data science* technologies to improve its overall performance across a range of different operations. For example, big aerospace companies like Boeing, Airbus, and SpaceX are using data sensors to further improve their propulsion technologies.

Link for Reference: https://www.opentracker.net/article/how-big-data-is-transforming-the-aerospace-industry
